description.name: Central Hill Apartments
description.description: Located on the hillside just across the valley from Dragolm's historical district, our apartments offer you the ideal possibility of spending a pleasant summer in the heart of Transylvania in a quiet neighbourhood, yet with full comfort of the city. The whole Central Hill area is known for its cosy cafes, excellent dining options as well as beautiful park walks. Do not hesitate to experience this yourself!

apartment-1-bedroom.name: One-bedroom Apartment
apartment-1-bedroom.description: Small apartment with a single bedroom, kitchen and bathroom. The bedroom contains a double bed.

apartment-2-bedroom.name: Two-bedroom Apartment
apartment-2-bedroom.description: Larger apartment with two bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom and a living room. In one of the bedrooms, there is a double bed; in the other one, there are twin beds.

apartment-1-bedroom.name: One-bedroom apartment
apartment-1-bedroom.description: Price per week for the smaller apartment.

apartment-2-bedroom.name: Two-bedroom apartment
apartment-2-bedroom.description: Price per week for the larger apartment.
